channel.title: tranquilpeak on My first hugo blog
channel.description: Recent content in tranquilpeak on My first hugo blog

item.description: 最基本的HTML语法 <!DOCTYPE html>//声明该文档是HTNL文档，可以省略 <html lang="en">//声明该文档使用的语言 <head>//表示该文档开始部分 <meta charset="UTF-8">//声明文档的编码方式 <title>1111</title>//浏览器中文档头部 </head> <body>//文档正文内容 111 </body> </html> 最基本元素 form表单元素 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>HTML5</title> </head> <body> 列表 <ol><!--有序列表--> <li>a</li> <li>b</li> <li>c</li> </ol> <ol reversed><!--倒序--> <li>a</li> <li>b</li> <li>c</li> </ol> <ol type="I"><!--增加序号--> <li>a</li> <li>b</li> <li>c</li> </ol> <ul><!--无序列表--> <li>a</li> <li>b</li> <li>c</li> </ul> 表单元素form <br><br> <form> Input <br><br> <ol> Input single line text <br> <input type="text" value="点击输入"><br>add a input box with the background text can delete <br><br> Input many lines text <br> <textarea rows="2" cols="10">aaaaaaaaa</textarea><br><br> <input type="text" placeholder="点击输入"><br> add a input box with the background text can't edit <br><br> <input type="text" placeholder="点击输入" size="45"><br>the box size edit and box's width add <br><br> <input type="text" placeholder="www" maxlength="6"><br>add a input box with the background text can't edit and input text length limit <br><br> <input type="text" value="点击输入" readonly><br>add a input box with the background text can't edit <br><br> <input type="password" placeholder="input Password"><br>Password can't show <br><br> </ol> Click Button <br> <ol> <input type="button" value="确认1"> <button>确认2</button> <input type="submit" value="确认3"><br>three diff buttons use <br>Function: Button>input button> input submit </ol> Slip mode <br> <ol> Range:add a slip mode,value is position of start <br> <input type="range" min="0" max="100" step="5" value="1"><br><br> Number:add a click mode <br> <input type="number" min="0" max="100" step="5" value="1"><br><br> </ol> Checkbox(复选框):Please choice one <br> <ol> <input type="checkbox">是<input type="checkbox">否 <br>add a click choice<br><br> 多个选项和只能选其一 <br> <input type="radio" name="a" checked>1<input type="radio"name="a">2<input type="radio"name="a">3 </ol> 下拉式选项卡 <ol> 下拉框选项卡1:不可以再次编辑，只能选择给出选项 <br> what is your choice?
